import React from "react"; import FormattedDay from "./FormattedDate"; import FormattedTime from "./FormattedTime"; import WeatherIcon from "./WeatherIcon"; import UnitConversion from "./UnitConversion"; export default function display(props) { return (
{/*

{props.data.city}

{props.data.description}
  • {props.data.humidity} %
  • {props.data.wind} Km/h

*/}

{props.data.city}

  • %
  • Km/h
); }
